DOC.criteria: Undergoing surgical management suspect diagnosis Gynecologic Malignancy ( Endometrial , Ovarian , Vulvar , Vaginal , Primary Peritoneal , Fallopian Tube ) Age 18 great Receiving care University Michigan Comprehensive Cancer Center Gynecologic Oncology Clinic St. Joseph Mercy Hospital , Alexander Cancer Care Center Able understand read English Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 02 Patients must work telephone , mobile land line Severe hearing impairment limit ability use audiobased guided imagery module Current document alcohol abuse illicit drug substance abuse Planned outpatient surgery Patients currently participate meditation practice 1 hour per week prior preoperative visit .
